name: Jump! [BETA]
description:
Hello!

Lately i have been trying out BuildBox and i was interested for people to test out my game. 

Currently i'm a rookie at this, cause i just started. But i really hope you enjoy this cause it was an free, simple and nice project that i made. I have no idea if it runs, i do not care. Just test it out and play it for free.

Leave a reply if you would like too!

-FreeDev Studios
